body_html:
Hey greg, thanks for the mock up.

This does look like a good fit for the TensorBoard plugin system, and for some additional run metadata that we are planning to add that could populate the Description, Revision, Topology, fields, etc. I could imagine something like this being the default starting page for TensorBoard.

However, on our end we won't be ready to really start integrating plugins like this until the end of January at the earliest. Do you mind if we put this issue on hold for a few months while we get things ready on the TensorBoard side?

body:
Hey greg, thanks for the mock up.

This does look like a good fit for the TensorBoard plugin system, and for some additional run metadata that we are planning to add that could populate the Description, Revision, Topology, fields, etc. I could imagine something like this being the default starting page for TensorBoard.

However, on our end we won't be ready to really start integrating plugins like this until the end of January at the earliest. Do you mind if we put this issue on hold for a few months while we get things ready on the TensorBoard side?
